title: [Mode Concept] Minion Rebellion
body:
Would Need a New Map:
Central keep with 2 small "camps" (Team 1 camp, team 2 camp)
Each camp has a nexus and 2 towers
The keep has 4 towers per lane and a nexus
* Outer tower
* Inner tower
* 2 nexus towers
Each minions tower spawns 2 waves of minions every 15 seconds
Minions get stronger for each tower missing from said lane
New Minions that have abilities and some with AP damage
Your team gets no minions
3-5 players per team. or small and large varients. or 4 teams of 3 and 4 camps?

Win/Lose Conditions:
First team to take the minions nexus or make the other team fall to the minions wins.
OR You lose if your nexus dies or the other team takes the minion nexus first

Rules:
1. You cannot attack the other teams turrets or nexus
2. All towers of your lane must be down to attack the nexus
3. The Minions Nexus is locked to the first team to attack it for 10 seconds or till no team member of that team is within 1500
4. Turrets and minions of the enemies lanes will not attack you

Objectives:
1. Disrupt the enemy lane by assisting the minions of that lane in the deaths of their enemy champions
2. Support the Minions Rebellion by supplying the opposite lane with materials from beasts with 4 epic monster spawn points that will help the minions with defense or attack or allow for special minion spawns.
3. 1 Legendary monster spawn that, when sold to the vendor at you base, activates UMA (the Ultimate Minion Annihilator) and wipes your lane of all minions and disables their spawn for 30 seconds.

replies.body:
Interesting. But how would you take the minion's turrets without minions of your own?

Also, I foresee {{champion:131}} and {{champion:17}} becoming _the_ meta in that mode.
what if there were no towers for the minions only inhibs, each inhib you take increases the power of the minions you fight

That would be a likely alteration to the design, but the minion's turrets are meant to diversify the team. You'll need a tank.

This way, a team of assassins would be much more vulnerable to losing via not being able to get past the minion's turrets. Though, that comp would be more focused on disrupting the enemy team anyways rather than quelling their rebels.
power farmers like hiemer, vik and sivir would be op in this

There will be many more minions and they will be stronger. As well, you wont have any minions to distract them. So the early game would be a little more difficult than a normal.

12 minions first and second wave alone (5/10 seconds after they start)
24 third and fourth (15/20 seconds after start)
36 then on until their first tower is downed (remember you have no minions to take tower shots)
* By this point you are probably farming under your tower unless you have a lot of wave clear
First tower dropped as stated above decreases the spawns but also increases the power of all the minions across the board
would you be able to harass the eneny?
Yes, that would be one of the tactics to get a win
True, but it doesn't have to be balanced if it is a featured game mode. Plus, power farmers tend to be vulnerable to dives, which are incentivized in this game mode.
